content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 19:30, i was on a flight as it approached portland international airport.  i was seated in a window seat approx. 6 rows in front of the wing at that time.  around 15 minutes prior to landing (ne approach), i noticed an unidentified object in the sky, while viewing the landscape below.  we were still several thousand feet off the ground (houses were approx. 5mm in size) at this time.  the object appeared to be stationary and approximately 1000 feet below us and to the left of the plane.  it consisted of a cluster of round metallic objects making up the top half of the craft, which via a circular midsection joined an elongated four sided pyramid as the bottom half.  all areas of the craft were silver and reflective in nature.  the top half can best be described as if you created a larger sphere out of adjoining smaller spheres.  this top half was not elongated or billowing in the wind as a weather ballon might do.  

i observed the object for approx. 5 seconds, as my plane passed by.  my view of the object was excellent.  there were no clouds in the sky, and i could see multiple details of the craft.  i did not note any vapors or heat waves emanating from the craft.  after we left the craft behind, i began scanning objects on the ground to reference the crafts size.  my best guess is comparing it to a semi truck while we were 600 ft above it.  

others may have seen this craft but no one said anything on the flight.  unfortunately we passed by too quick to take a picture, but i am 100% certain of what i saw.
content.summary: Large stationary craft seen from plane as we approached portland international airport

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard barbecuing with the family and i always take out my camera which has 1000 zoom and just having a good time with the family just happened to take a break from barbecuing and i looked up in the sky which i always do and happened to see a shiny sphere with a dome (ufo) with yellow lights and it was spinning. at first glance i thought it was a ufo due to it being soo shiny. i took 4 pictures and previewed the pictures i could't believe my own eyes to see an sphere with a dome. i tried to take a video but it was gone after 90 seconds. i still cannot believe i have this picture on my camera. i was excited and when i showed my neighbors they're jaw dropped and said wow u caught a real one there, meaning ufo with the dome as you can clearly see it on the pictures. this is my story and it's a great feeling to see something like this ufo that is out of this world. if you want proof of this siting you can contact me or visit.
content.summary: I was in my backyard and with my hd camera i happened to look up and saw a shiny spinning ufo.I then grabbed my camera and took pictures of it and when i previewed the pictures i could't believe my own eyes.It was a sphere with a dome and i have the proof

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were sitting out in the front yard...As we were sitting there talking i happened to look up and saw a big, red ball hovering over us. i went to get my ipod.  upon returning back outside it was still hovering over us...Then it began to fade a bit. then it brightened back up and started moving toward the mountain behind us.  there is decended down into the mountains.
content.summary: Sitting outside noticed a big ball of redish hovering above us. it hovered over us and then decended over to a mountain and decended there.

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 12 years old riding my bicycle with my brother and a friend of mine.   we were downtown victoria and rode to the roof top of one of the parkades.    if i can remember correctly, it was a summer day and it event took place late in the afternoon or early evening.

we were only up there a short time when i noticed a low flying v shaped object.   it was solid black with what appeared to be windows that seemed to be pulsating different colours.  it was travelling slowly in a westerly direction.  it would stopped occasionally to drop orbs of some kind that also flashed different colours of light.

these flashing orbs disappeared a short time after leaving the object.  seeing this my brother and my friend quickly rode away leaving me to watch the object.  i managed to see the flying object drop a couple of additional flashing orbs before i had to chase after my brother and my buddy. 

because of that i did not get a chance to see where the flying object went to.  to this day i regret not sticking around for a longer time.   i know for a fact that it was (in my terms) a ufo.  since it was flying object and it was unidentified to me, it was and has always been a ufo. 

i recall the my brother and my friend were not comfortable with the object, but as for myself, i was fascinated with the object.  for a long time afterwards, i began researching ufos (and ifos, efos, etc).   

this event has been with my for over 40 years and i never thought about telling anyone.   a number of years ago, i asked my brother if he  remembered the event.  he said he vaguely remembers seeing something, but he really can't remember what he saw.

i have no proof of what i saw, except for the visual images in my head.  therefore, i'm sure that many experts would simply say that i imagined it and my "dreams" have now become my reality.  however, i know what i saw and i don't care what anyone else has to say about that. 

i know i should have reported this years ago, but it's only since i've started to watch some of the mufon shows on tv that i thought i should report my old sighting.  

if the information is too trivial or the information insufficient for your records, i understand.  i simply wanted to let someone other my family to know what i saw and that i'm standing behind what i saw.

thank you for your time.
content.summary: It was a black v shaped object, with flashing lights that dropped flashing orbs

content.detailedDescription: Object flew across the horizon first from south to north then from north to south.
content.summary: Star like object

content.detailedDescription:
my son went outside on our porch to smoke at 10:40 p.M. i went out to join him about ten minutes later because my dog was whining and i thought he needed to go out.  my son was staring out the screen door and said, "do you see that"?  i looked out expecting to see a coyote or similar animal which is common out here(rural area 150 acres).  instead i saw huge bright red lights hovering right above the treeline toward the middle of our mile long gravel driveway (woods on both sides of driveway).  i didn't know what it was, i just knew it shouldn't be there.  we never see anything out here in the middle of nowhere.  i stared in shock before deciding to take a closer look.  i opened the screen door and as soon as i did the lights completely vanished.  just totally disappeared. my son said, "we need to go inside now".  i agreed.  
  my son is 24 and does not scare easily.  he was freaked out and will not talk about it at all anymore.  he won't go outside after dark now and pulls all of the curtains closed when the sun goes down.  what he told me before he shut up completely about it was that when he first noticed the lights they were red and blinked rapidly, then they went white and then the shape appeared to be halo graphic. he told me that they turned solid bright red right before i came out. 
  since that night my husband and i have both seen increased activity in the sky at night.  there is seldom any kind of air traffic here day or night.  now, nightly there are flashing red lights, bright white balls of light that appear and disappear, red blinking lights that will have a bright white blinking light that follows behind it, and once a round green blinking light hovered in same spot as the first sighting.  most of the lights we see come from a north west direction and go south east then turn and go north. the past few nights when i've been sitting on the porch with my dog (all three times between 10:15 p.M. and 11:00 p.,), my dog will start whining and getting agitated.  he will nudge me and sit by the door to go in the house, and the past two nights he actually started barking.  my dog is a pitbull/boxer mix.  he's very smart, protective and does not bark unless there is something serious enough to bark at.  when he barks, i listen.  
  it took me a while to search anything out about this.  honestly, i was afraid of what i would find out.  i'm having a real hard time living out here now and am noticing more strange things like static on radio, weird clicking noises outside etc.  i might be imagining things due to what we've seen.  but whatever the case may be, i'm not relaxed out here in the country anymore. my anxiety level is through the roof, especially when it gets dark.  i feel like i have to watch the sky at night, but am scared of what i will see.  not sure what i should be doing or not doing. would love to hear i'm imagining things, it's nothing and not to worry about it.  i could really use some help here.
content.summary: Huge light/lights (changed color several times) hovered above tree line for 20 min. before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: I had worked late that night and my mother had come by to make me a late supper. after we had finished and she was leaving to go home i walked her to her car. we talked a bit and as we stood by the side of her car, we both saw this brilliant blue ball come over the treeline at a 45 degree angle. it was traveling north to south at an incredible speed. it then stopped, hovered for about 3 seconds and then did an erratic series of maneuvers that was almost to fast to follow. it then stopped, hovered for another 3 seconds and then burst straight down behind the treeline again. my mother and i just looked at each other stunned. i started to say over and over,"what was that?" mom said," that was no airplane!" and she looked a little worried. we looked to the spot where we had seen the object and a small plane flew through the same area where the object had been seconds before. we watched another ten minutes but saw nothing further. the object was a brilliant blue and pulsated when it hovered.
content.summary: Blue neon ball came up from the treeline at 45 degrees hovered, did an erratic series of maneuvers , hovered again then dove straight down at an incredible speed.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home around 8:10 am with my five year old nephew. as we were coming to a stop we both noticed a large metallic orb hovering in the sky.  it looked like fluid metal.  it had no lights no colors.  it didn't move.  we were forced to move and stop watching when our light turned green. not anywhere to stop and get out. the whole while i'm having mason explain to me what he is seeing. he described it just as i was seeing it.
content.summary: Driving home from dropping b/f @ work with 5 year old nephew. as we came to intersection and red light we both observed a large metallic orborb hovering in sky right above intersection.  it looked fluid if that makes since.

content.detailedDescription: Okay. i we were under a tornado warning for our area. so the curious person that i am decided to go outside and observe the sky. there was low cloud cover and the clouds were very dark but in spots some were white. the wind was steady. i was on the back porch looking up towards the north because thats were an apparent tornado was forming. 20 to 30 miles north of me. so as im in awe of the low cloud cover and weird clouds i saw a pitch black spherical object moving pretty steady and moving in a straight line going north. i watched the object for a minute or two then it disappeared into the dark clouds. these clouds were dark and this object was pitch black. no sound. didnt waver at all even thou the winds were steady to strong. also i observed a large black bird lower in altitude but the bird was having a hard time flying in the wind. i was in awe. like time stopped for a minute. then i saw the bird and realized what i had seen. time was around 4:10 pm on june 7 2014. what was weird was it was heading straight towards the storm.(tornado) i've heard of ufo's being seen near volcano eruptions. so maybe this is some what of the same thing. observing the tornado? whatever it was ive seen nothing like it ever before.
content.summary: On back porch looking up at clouds. saw a perfectly black object moving steadily and in a straight path going north.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend (who wishes to remain anonymous) and i were finished disc golfing at kensington metropark and started walking back to my car when we noticed what we originally thought to be an airplane at medium-high altitude traveling at a fairly slow rate with no trails or sound. upon further inspection we noticed it had a brilliant orange metallic surface, with no visible wings. the craft was angled like it was descending (angled towards the ground), but was traveling in a horizontal line. it appeared to have a satellite-esque protrusion (multiple thin parts from a single bar) coming off of the side/top that was too small to be a wing of that sized craft (a regular airliner jet). we watched for about 20 seconds as it slowly moved on it's course, commenting on how strange it looked for an airplane. after that we put our bags into the car and looked up at the same spot it was in only to realize that the craft had completely vanished. no trace of trajectory, no sound, no silhouettes, nothing the craft could hide behind; it was simply gone. 

while viewing the object both of us were intrigued, but not frightened or excited in any way. after the craft had disappeared i got a sense of weirdness ("something doesn't feel right", i can't comment on my friend's emotions as he does not wish to speak about the incident in it's entirety). we hung out for awhile after witnessing the object and did not really speak about what we had seen (my friend was rather adamant about avoiding it, and was unresponsive when i brought up the possibility that it could have been a ufo).
content.summary: Metallic orange "plane" with no wings, strange angle for direction of travel (pointed down but moving straight forward). disappeared from clear sky instantly

content.detailedDescription:
i was near the beach not far from the apartment building where i lived when i was confronted by the most amazing sight.  not fifty feet away hovering about eight feet off the ground there was a dull white heavily domed flying saucer. the craft was about twenty five feet wide, smooth and featureless; its surface was so matte that no light was reflected from it's skin. while i was certainly in awe and somewhat thrilled, i had a secondary feeling of irritation if not disappointment.  as seven year old american boy living in circa 1972 puerto rico, i new exactly what flying saucers and space ships are supposed to look like: they where supposed to sleek and covered in chrome with all kinds of high tech gizmos and lights just like in marvel comics.  this saucer was nothing like that and besides its oversized dome made it look kind of fat and goofy; it really did not look like it could fly very fast at all.  anyway, after a moment it began to slowly rise and as it did so the air became saturated with a power full electromagnetism; it almost felt "solid".  i looked down at my right forearm and all the hairs had stood up like they when i put my arm near the screen of a color tv.  then it very gracefully floated away over the water.  the outer wall of the "bubble" of electricity passed through my body in the direction that the craft was going and the electromagnetic effect on the air was gone, like flipping a switch.  then staying less than one hundred feet above the water the saucer arced slightly to the right and i lost sight of saucer behind a cluster of tall trees.
     after a moment of staring out over the empty water whishing i could still see the craft i turned to my right and there was my mother looking out over the water.  at that moment it hit me that we had both been on the ship together and i had a fuzzy memory of a dark place and me having to endure something very unpleasant.  she turned to me and said in a marked german accent "it would be better if you told no one what happened here".  she turned to leave then stopped and clarified: "it would be better if you did not tell you father what happened here".  i was a little confused as to why she would make such a big deal about all this; as far as i was concerned, yes there was something that happened that was strange and unpleasant but it was over with, i was glad that it was so why wasn't she?  her eyes seemed glassy and her movements where slow and dazed (also, my mother was born in germany but is highly assimilated - sometimes when she has had a little wine or is over tired her accent comes back.  i never noticed this phenomena until someone pointed it out to me when i was in my twenties).  we returned to our penthouse apartment in silence.  when we got inside she muttered something about "we should take a nap" while making strait for her bedroom.  i felt a desperate need to sleep and literally dove into my bed and was immediately asleep.  i do not remember waking up and the memories of that day lay buried for more than four decades.  then suddenly, for no reason that i can see, one day in 2014 i suddenly remembered standing in front of the flying saucer as a seven year old child and it all came flooding back down to the smallest of details.
content.summary: I saw a white domed craft hovering eight feet off the ground fifty feet away. after a moment it rose and floated away.

content.detailedDescription:
Girlfriend sitting on porch at about 4:38 a.M. noticed bright, star-like object between trees about 40 degrees on horizon. appeared a little larger than a star or planet. got camera and took several photos at varying magnifications. it appeared to be heading directly toward her which frightened her.She ran inside after having taken several stills and 2 video's. a 4 second video and a 15 second video captured the event. she came back out a few seconds later and the object was gone.
as i write this,she is not available to verify my retelling of the incident.
content.summary: Round,glowing object,concentric circles within circles inside. soft outside edge may have been due to camera zoom.Appeared to move directly toward girlfriend,increasing in size.Camera

content.detailedDescription:
I was 12 years old at the time and.My friend and i were laying on the ground around a bonfire looking up at the sky. i noticed some movement with a star and followed it.

the object appeared just as a star in the sky. it seemed to travel roughly the speed of our satellites assuming it was at that approximate height. it travelled ~1/3 the distance of the arc horizon to horizon in ~2minutes, stopped for several minutes then proceeded in 90 degree path another distance ~ 1/2 the original distance then stopped. in other words, the orb or object made an "l" the night sky.

we didn't see it move again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star looking orb draws a gigantic "l" in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Having become bored with the crab eyes photos i've been capturing in the sky, i recently decided to lower my aim and start focusing a little closer to the horizon. i discovered that when i can catch a ufo just above some roof tops it tends to make the photo a bit more exciting, and also ads an element of context to the picture. i didn't get anything remarkable during my lunch hour last wednesday, but i got some incredible photos during the bus ride home after work.

when taking photos i've been basically just shooting blind. in every case thus far i haven't seen anything other than the normal backdrop, whether it's the sky, clouds, or whatever. then when i get home i download my latest pics and examine my catch, often using filters to make sure i haven't missed anything. well as you'll be able to see, i didn't need filters to reveal these ufos(except just to clarify a weak part of one photo).

should also mention that last monday i believe a crab eyes ufo eased up on me at a very low altitude, during the last few minutes of my lunch break, at around 12:30. had been taking photos earlier, and had filled up the internal memory of my camera. after taking my camera back inside i saw i had enough time left for one more smoke. while having my last smoke, a narrow rectangular cloud came sliding along from the southwest and then stopped just short of being directly overhead. there was a lacy sort of cloud ceiling in the sky, at a much higher altitude, and it was barely moving. this rectangular band was the only cloud this low, and moving this deliberately. the cloud was more dense at the outer edges, and thin in the middle, making me suspect it was a crab eyes concealing itself with something akin to cloud blinders. i stood there thinking "man, you guys sure have some brass to slide up here in broad daylight like this, in the middle of the city". after finishing my cigarette i waved at them, and then lifted my cup of coffee upwards as a gesture of salute before heading back inside.
content.summary: Photographed both crab eyes ufos and orbs

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the balcony of my apartment at just after midnight. the weather was clear and, along with the other air traffic in the pbi area i observed what appeared to be an incandescent, (vs led or white), extremely bright orange light to the south approximately heading 170 degrees, (as per my cellphone compass).  i waited for what i assumed was an airplane to pass by and looked up occasionally to watch it's progress. i am not one hundred percent sure of the time it was there in that form, but it must have been at least a minute. looking back up at the light it appeared to extinguish  and a small, very dim light appeared to climb in altitude from the location of the bright light. while very dim, it was possible to see it the entire time as it seemed to climb from my perspective. it then slowed and appeared to move laterally in my direction. as it got closer its shape became what looked to me to be a that of a disc. i did not see any flatness to the object from its approach to it passing directly overhead as i watched the entire time. it was silent and seemed to emit a soft orange glow as if heated. there was a darker spot in the center. there were no lights beside the glow and no discernible markings. i was unable to see it once it had passed overhead due to the building structure. it moved on a straight path at what seemed a consistent altitude. it's speed could be compared to an airliner in the terminal environment on approach, i.E. it wasn't in a hurry.

i am an atp rated  pilot with over 30 years experience flying in the nyc area. i have had to judge lights and distances of all types of flying machines and know the difference between an airplane, helicopter, internally illuminated airship, hot air balloon, etc. the actual size of the object was difficult to discern as its altitude was unknown. while it wasn't low in my opinion, (low being one to two thousand feet), had it been just above that it would have been comparable to a large airplane. if it was outside the atmosphere, it would have been tremendous.
content.summary: Observed bright light south. light dissipated then small light shot upwards. disc/orb moved from small light to larger size and passed overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was trying to take a photo of the guess ad that was on the side of the buiding in miami on friday the 6th of june 2014 and i didnt see the image till i reviewed the photo later...Just an interesting image...
content.summary: Looked like a square box, cloud or dimension, which i didnt see until i looked at the photo

content.detailedDescription: I am an insomniac and a smoker who often stargazes late at night. i have never before seen anything strange in the sky. right around 4:30am may 6th 2014 i noticed 2 small planes who almost look like they were on a collision course seeming to head into the local johnson county executive airport near my house. one from the west and the other from the south. it caught my eye and seemed odd. two planes so close to each other (from my view at least)seeming to be coming in for landings at the same time was something i had never seen before. slightly above these two planes in the distance a bright light caught my eye. two to three times brighter than a bright star or planet with no blinking lights like on the planes i usually see. the light moved very slow and steady from west to east not covering much distance at all. i wrote down the viewing at around 15 seconds but it had me so mesmerized it had to be 30 or more with time for the planes to clear and the sound from them gone. the light slowed to a stop and disappeared shooting in a different direction to the south so fast with a slight tail like streak and gone. over the next five minutes i saw 2 blinks of light from the area it disappeared in. i went inside to get my phone so i could document the time and came back out. in awe of what i had seen i continued to watch that same area of the sky. at exactly 4:48am in the same small area of the sky i see a similar if not the same bright object moving south to south east. it wasn't moving in a straight flight pattern but not quite zigzagging either. i wrote down viewing time for 12 seconds but once again with my amazement distracting me it could of been closer to 30 moving slow and steady. then the object disappeared is the same area. one blink from the same area a couple minutes later. i was spooked! 5am i came inside and wrote all this down. a full page of descriptions, thoughts, times, etc. i am an amateur astronomer at best but my good friend (who teaches astronomy at a local college)and i have been out many nights a few years back with large telescopes tracking and photographing the moon and various planets. i have seen all kinds of planes (which usually at night you can see their blinking lights even at great altitudes), choppers, blimps, satellites, meteors and it resembled nothing i had ever seen before. no tail except when it disappeared at great rate of speed in a different direction. the light moved abnormally slow and high in the sky way to slow to be a meteorite or a satellite. i did some research the next day and found out that the eta aquarids meteor shower was peaking that night. i am ashamed to say i had never heard of this meteor shower before. i stayed up until 6am the following evening to watch the shower while it was still in its peak and saw many meteors. these meteors all having long tails streaking across the sky in the blink of an eye but were nothing like what i saw on the previous night. i have questioned reporting this for a month now but believe with more educated eyes possibly watching the skies that night and the two planes in the vicinity that there is a high possibility that someone else may have seen it also. i do not believe that this was part of the meteor shower but that's just my opinion. i have no idea what it was. july 6th 2014 around 3:25am i saw something very similar fly across the sky. it was a very bright light just like what i saw before. no blinking lights. flying from north to south southeast. it cleared the entire skyline in under a minute until it was out of view. it cleared more distance in so little time than i have ever seen. it gave me chills. i am a hardcore skeptic but am open mined. i do not know what i saw but these two incidents were nothing like i have ever seen before. an email reply would be nice on any thought or similar reports on these dates and times.
content.summary: Saw a very bright light change directions, disapear, then reappear and move not in a straight line

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: It was a clear night. was out side and saw a straneg light ran in the house and got my camra and got some picks of some thing that was some of the most butifull iv ever goten. have no idea what it was but i dont think its man made it was moving at such speeds that it would be beound what we could bild and have it survive the g foers that this must have been induring. i lived at airway hiets in washington at the end of one of the run ways i seen s r 71s back wheen the u s said that it did not exsist and saw missial tests and a wide rang of air craft.This was some thing that was far beond any thing i have ever seen. the speed and chaeng of direcktion was breth taking it stoped and was stationariy. i tryed to fockus in on it and it was just gon. don't know what it was but i got some killer picks.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blue light moving at incrediball speeds whith the moon in backe drop

content.detailedDescription:
Black cubic like object at first hovered and then ascended straight up until it became invisible, seemed to have gone/flown(?) right into space.
i have been an amateur astronomer for almost 40 years. 
when a friend an i visited rimini, italy we never expected anthing like this.
we have witnessed many things up in the air over there during daytime (like balloons and kite sailers), but this sighting happened after sunset and noone was near that place.
when we first saw this (supposed) object it was bigger and completely black and (appeared) cubic shaped.
there was no sound whatsoever.
the whole event lasted about 5-7 minutes
after a 3 minutes or so i took two pictures of the phenomena with a 60 mm lens (with about 1 minute in between).
pictures show the object definitely moved (straight up it seemed).
there were (at least) 6 witnesses who regarded the object as being highly unusual (4 being italians, both of us being belgian tourists).
being a scientist i feel the need to report this, but i do understand very well this may be something very ordinary and that our eyes simply playing tricks on us.
i was of course not prepared for something like this or would have brought a high zoom camera and binoculars.
maybe other reports can somehow confirm this sighting and that's why i post it. it's a ufo in the sense that i have no idea what this might have been.
the closest thing i could think of being a candidate is a balloon of some kind ?
content.summary: Black cubic like object at first hovered and then ascended straight up until it became invisible

content.detailedDescription: I was just getting my second cup of coffee, as i turned around i saw this very intense light out my front window. it was a red object hovering over the lake. it was very very red! it was not moving, but was very bright. it looked like a mushroom or umbrella shaped object. the "stem" seemed to be touching the water, and was very bright red, but not as bright as the object. in those few seconds i was trying to make sense of what it could be. i was trying to see if it could be a reflection or light from someone elses house. there is no way it could be. it was the size of about 2 suv's. this was amazing! i stood there for about 10 seconds, stunned. then i called out to my boyfriend to come look, never taking my eyes off of it. he was sleeping, it took him a few seconds to come out to look. by the time he got there it was gone. it didn't fly, it just disappeared. the whole thing lasted about 20-30 seconds. we both stood there for a while to see if it might return. it didn't. i was not scared, i was very curious. i drew a picture right away, as to not miss any detail. i'm 51 years old, and absolutely positive of what i saw. i have never seen anything like this before in my life!! i have never seen the color red so intense. wow.
content.summary: Intense red object looked like a mushroom or umbrella on top "stem" seemed to be touching water.

content.detailedDescription: In the very near future i will submit two incidents of ufo sightings that i have experienced in 2010 and 2013. you will not be disappointed.They are real!!!!!!!
content.summary: Observed a group of lights hovering along in the sky. than suddenly changed direction towards and hovered over my home as i watched

content.detailedDescription: In the very near future i will submit two incidents of ufo sightings that i have experienced in 2010 and 2013. you will not be disappointed.They are real!!!!!!!
content.summary: Observed a group of lights hovering along in the sky. than suddenly changed direction towards and hovered over my home as i watched

content.detailedDescription:
in the early morning hours of fall/1977,i was coming back from the bathroom to my bedroom, in which i shared with my younger sister. we routinely slept with either the window and/or curtains open because of being on the second floor and no other houses or persons with 2 stories could see in our room. as i came back in my room to get into bed. looking out (west) i spotted a large metallic dome shaped object with lite windows around the bottom half of the dome, hovering over elevated transit tracks(bart)at the end of my block. at that point, i woke my sister and she looked at it through the window and immediately got back under her covers shaking violently in fear, at the same time i continued to watch in  amazement the object by peeking over the window sill. it followed the tracks.... very slowly (north)moving along the tracks and when it got the street parallel to mine, it turned down the street in my direction moving... very slowly, saying this to my sister she again shook terribly under her covers. i continued to watch the object until it was parallel to side of my window in the next street over. at that point, it stopped for second and then shot off at incredible/supersonic speed (south/east)over mt hamilton. it almost seemed like it imploded? i of course told my sister it was gone and she stopped shaking. weird, cause i just went to back to bed for maybe an hour or so before getting up for school and mentioned it to my mother and she just blew my off....Then said something to my best friend before school and she made fun of me!
another strange thing is my sister and i didn't talk about the incident until a few years later i mentioned it to her and i could see her fear and not wanting to talk about it. to this day she will acknowledge seeing the object but not much more.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was coming back  from bathroom to my bedroom (shared with sister) in early morning hours and spotted large metallic object, it was hovering over transit tracks and watched it move down street and shoot off into horizon

content.detailedDescription: 7 or 8 spots of lights hovering in formation on focus looks like light glowing from human like shapes. i was at a nearby shop, few people were gazing at that light hovering west in the sky and asked me what it is, it looked like a blue light spot hovering in the sky, for a clear view, i ran and brought my point & shoot and clicked a few pics on full zoom, on focus it looked like 7 or 8 spots of light, on a better focus it appeared like light glowing from cylindrical shapes, the thing was frequently changing elevation and hovering and moving in all directions and at times was stationary.
content.summary: 7 or 8 spots of lights hovering in formation on focus looks like light glowing from cylindrical shapes

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting in the mad hatter cafe on western road with the junction of montpelier road,with my girlfriend.I was sat inside ,opposite the open double doors.Outside was a cable between two buildings that went above the road,which had banners on it.Slightly above the cable,i saw a black dot,stationary.I initially thought it was one of our seagulls hovering in flight.Upon watching it for about twenty seconds ,i decided it was not a hovering ,distant bird.My staring caused my girlfriend to ask what i was looking at,and i told her theres something up there thats not moving.About a minute had elapsed by this time since first spotting the "dot" and it had not moved from its position,although i did notice it rise and fall very slightly before remaining still again .My girlfriend then went out onto the doorway to look and then take a photograph.By now it must have been just over two minutes in since first awareness of it. i then went out and was handed the camera to take a photo,which i did.Immediately i took the picture,the "dot" began to move in a southerly direction,but erratically,in that it seemed to go up and down ,whilst moving forward at the same time,and then loop around on itself.At this point i looked away to look at the camera,but my girlfriend was watching it still,and said it descended as a building in the foreground then hid it from view.
an employee of the cafe,and a customer of the cafe,witnessed mine and my girlfriends activity surrounding the sighting and photographing of the "dot" but did not actually see it themselves.
after seeing the way the object moved after being photographed,i can only say that it seemed to "react" to being photoed.It had not moved at all,untill the second after a picture was taken,and then it flew away in its erratic fashion.This is what convinced me that the object was in no way a helicopter,its turns were too tight and too swift in my opinion.I am familiar with aircraft to a degree,and the characteristics of the objects manouvre were not at all consistent with a manned helicopter.To say it was an aeroplane is ludicrous.I was then excited ,as i am convinced that the object was a "u.F.O."
we took three photographs with a nikon coolpix l820 zoom digital camera.
upon arriving home my girlfriend immediately loaded the photos onto her laptop computer,onto a "viewnx 2" programme,which is a nikon photo programme.Only two pictures were clear,showing the small "dot".Upon zooming in on the "dot",its image becomes very distorted and unrecognisable as any definitive object ,wich i find most strange....
all that does appear to be seen of the enhanced image of the "dot" ,is that it appears to be in two halves,each half looking like a burger bun.The whole shape overall looks like a burger!
content.summary: Hovering.Moved off in an erratic pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and went outside on our back deck to smoke a cigarette. the sky was clear save for a few small clouds, and while looking up i saw disc-shaped object moving at very high speed behind the sparse clouds within my direct line of sight. i have been in and around aircraft all my life ( my father is a ga pilot and i have been flying right seat aka co-pilot for 25 years, as well as having 20 hrs of flight instruction). i am also familiar with flight characteristics of modern high-performance aircraft,as well as their physical design. i just want to know if anyone else saw what i saw. unfortunately the sighting extremely brief, so i unfortunately haveing little more information.
content.summary: I had stepped onto my back deck, and was looking up because it was a clear night. that's when i saw it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with 3 friends at approximately 10:30 pm when we decided to look at the sky we than saw white/blue lights about 12 of them at first we thought they wer stars untill they appeared to be moving and hovering over the watervleat reservoir and radio towers on the top of the mountain every time a plane flew by they would trail it and than brake off and disappear for about 10 mins at a time a plane that appeared to be a c130 flew by and then the lights took off in all derations about 30 minuets later a plane flew by from the west 
all of a sudden 2 triangle shaped objects flowed it these object wear different than the previous white/blue blinking lights in the sky they hade three red lights one on each point of the triangle and wer black in the middle they than flew in a strange pattern unlike aneything iv ever seen they crossed each others paths and dropped up and down at a vary high speed then in the blink of an eye they then disappeared after that we saw nothing for about 30 more minutes until the white/blue lights apeard  agean and seemed to hover around the radio towers on the mountain we went back into the barn and a short time later we herd a helicopter and went outside to look we all saw a helicopter fling right above the tree line as if searching for something after that its like all the lights just disspieard
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Many blue and white lights flying near radio towers lasted for almost 3 hours

content.detailedDescription:
-what made me first notice the object was that i was looking in the sky at that time in the stars and then i noticed this fast travelling orange light , about 5 seconds later my brother noticed the exact same light and we both watched it travel across the sky . we were sitting on the roof top of our hotel having a smoke at the time of the sighting.. at first we thought it might be a plane or satellite but quickly debunked that as plane helicopters or satellites do not move in that direction or  speed .
- 12-18 star like amber lights in the shape of a boomerang . 
-brighter than a star it was travelling by the big dipper. 
- made two loops 
- disappeared behind building lights 
- our feelings were both confusion and disbelief as we both saw the exact same thing and have no way to explain it .
content.summary: Me and my brother were sitting on the roof top of our hotel we both noticed bright amber light in the shape of a boomerang traveling across the sky on an arc shape make two loops and then continue in it's path before disappearing behind building lights

content.detailedDescription: I was on haywood rd. in asheville nc on my way home from work at 11:04pm, driving. i noticed three glowing starlike objects in the sky so i parked the car at a gas station to observe them better. they were larger than the stars and were the same color as the orange road lights on light poles. one was tree top level the other two were much higher and a ways to the right. for the first minute i watched them they were stationary,  then the two at the top right started to fly away then fade out of sight. then the treetop one flew over to where they were and faded away. it lasted about 3 mins and i just went home afterwards. when i first saw the objects i immediately thout they were  ufos. i was very excited to see them especially when they started flying. on the way home tonight, which is three days afyer this reported sighting, i saw another curious orange orb above the mountains. i lost sight gowing arou d a curve, and couldnt park the car because i was on the highway.
content.summary: I saw three orange lights one was treetop level hovering and flying on my way home from work

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in car light out of control appearance darging at great speeds right then left red light and green light lowered left to the tree line split into two red lights and disappeared before tree line airplanes appearred shortly after in the area i sat km my car and shot videos with my cell phone. 44 to 5 minutes.11:15 till 11:35.I was very curious
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Start it up right bolive right then dumb then left and belo tree line
